items.content_html: This project is a lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Musixmatch API, making it super easy to fetch lyrics, track info, and artist details. Perfect for music apps, Discord bots, or settling lyric-based arguments with friends.
items.title: sh13y/Musixmatch: This project is a lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Musixmatch API, making it super easy to fetch lyrics, track info, and artist details. Perfect for music apps, Discord bots, or settling lyric-based arguments with friends.

items.content_html: A lightweight and developer-friendly **date formatting library** with full **i18n (internationalization)** support. Easily format dates into human-readable strings, customize relative time ("3 days ago"), and create localized messages. Perfect for multilingual web and mobile applications.
items.title: asmaelabid/date-formatter-i18n: A lightweight and developer-friendly **date formatting library** with full **i18n (internationalization)** support. Easily format dates into human-readable strings, customize relative time ("3 days ago"), and create localized messages. Perfect for multilingual web and mobile applications.

items.content_html: H12 is a lightweight javascript front-end library inspired from ReactJS, that allow using components which can use used around multiple places.
items.title: ayushpaultirkey/h12: H12 is a lightweight javascript front-end library inspired from ReactJS, that allow using components which can use used around multiple places.

items.content_html: A lightweight and flexible command-line interface (CLI) tool designed to streamline workflows, automate tasks, and provide customizable utilities for developers. Built with scalability and ease of use in mind, this CLI integrates seamlessly with your development environment to enhance productivity and simplify common operations.
items.title: qodalis-solutions/angular-web-cli: A lightweight and flexible command-line interface (CLI) tool designed to streamline workflows, automate tasks, and provide customizable utilities for developers. Built with scalability and ease of use in mind, this CLI integrates seamlessly with your development environment to enhance productivity and simplify common operations.

items.content_html: A lightweight RAG for embedding and querying codebases. This service allows users to download GitHub repositories, process their code, store it in a vector database, and query it using natural language to retrieve relevant code snippets. Perfect for building intelligent code search and analysis tools.
items.title: hashir-ayaz/codebase-rag: A lightweight RAG for embedding and querying codebases. This service allows users to download GitHub repositories, process their code, store it in a vector database, and query it using natural language to retrieve relevant code snippets. Perfect for building intelligent code search and analysis tools.

items.content_html: This RSS-API-Server is a Node.js-based API server built with TypeScript. It provides various endpoints for managing RSS feeds and user authentication, utilizing SQLite for data storage. The server is designed to be lightweight and efficient, making it suitable for integration with various applications.
items.title: OpCodeWolf/rss-api-server: This RSS-API-Server is a Node.js-based API server built with TypeScript. It provides various endpoints for managing RSS feeds and user authentication, utilizing SQLite for data storage. The server is designed to be lightweight and efficient, making it suitable for integration with various applications.

items.title: mia-platform/crud-service: A lightweight application to expose restful CRUD API over HTTP interface

items.title: outerbase/studio-desktop: Outerbase Studio Desktop is a lightweight Electron wrapper for the Outerbase Studio web version.
